To further enhance your experience with Siloam, we added a new feature:
Health Certificate - Now you can easily view your health certificate from your mobile device
Patient Portal - Access your medical history in Siloam directly in our application

We added some new features for you to enhance your experience with MySiloam:
- You can now choose to get your OTP verification from call or SMS
- Activate notification feature for new article
- Find your Medical Check-Up Report and other history admission in Patient Portal

- Find your Medical Check-Up Report and other history admission in Patient Portal

Good news for you or your family member who are part of the COVID-19 vaccination group, you can start scheduling your vaccine visit via the COVID-19 Vaccine menu on the MySiloam App.

For those of you who have been vaccinated against COVID-19 in Siloam Hospitals and have activated the patient portal feature, find your COVID-19 vaccine history through the Patient Portal menu.

We are constantly improving this application to serve you better. Don’t hesitate to contact us at support.mysiloam@siloamhospitals.com
